Files.Description: Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 (x86 and x64) - DVD (Russian)
Files.Notes:
NOTE: A newer version of Release Management is available with Team Foundation Server (TFS) 2015 Update 2. Release Management features have been integrated into TFS 2015 Update 2 and into the RELEASE hub in TFS web access. The new web-based version is the recommended alternative to the server and client version. For more information, see Release Management for TFS 2015 (Update 2 and above) and VS Team Services.

If you do not already have Release Management installed, we encourage you to use the web-based version in TFS 2015 Update 2 instead of the version described here. If you are already using an earlier server and client version, you may upgrade to the version described here. But, you should be aware that no new features will be added to server and client versions.

This update is the latest in a cumulative series of feature additions and bug fixes for Release Management for Visual Studio 2015.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 supports you to configure, approve, and deploy your applications for any environment. Create automated deployment orchestrations for each environment, no matter how complex the configuration. Delivering software more frequently and easily to an environment enables testers to get to work validating your system and keeps stakeholders engaged in providing feedback.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 requires one of the following licenses: Visual Studio Enterprise with MSDN, Visual Studio Enterprise – annual, Visual Studio Enterprise – monthly, Visual Studio Test Professional with MSDN, or MSDN Platforms. For licensing requirements, see the Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

VS Release Notes
TFS Release Notes
VS Known Issues
System Requirements
Compatibility

Files.Description: Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable (x86) - (Polish)
Files.Notes:
This update is the latest in a cumulative series of feature additions and bug fixes for Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable.

Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable installs run-time components of Visual C++ libraries. These components are required to run C++ applications that are developed using Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 and link dynamically to Visual C++ libraries. The packages can be used to run such applications on a computer even if it does not have Visual Studio 2015 installed. These packages also install run-time components of C Runtime (CRT), Standard C++, MFC, C++ AMP, and OpenMP libraries. Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable includes bug fixes to the runtime DLLs and also the latest versions for KB 2999226.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Professional 2015 with Update 2 (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (French)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Professional 2015 with Update 2 provides professional developer tools and services to individual developers and small teams. Create applications for multiple devices, PCs, and the web — all powered by the cloud and built on top of your existing applications and skills. Use cross-platform technologies to create applications for Windows, Android, and iOS from a single development solution and more.

These cumulative updates to Visual Studio 2015 include a variety of bug fixes and capability improvements.

If you have Visual Studio Professional 2015 installed on a machine with Internet access, Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 displays in the Notifications Hub. To install, select the notification, and then complete the installation actions. You can also download Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 here.

Note: If you have Visual Studio Professional 2015 (original release version) installed and run the download from this page, only Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 is installed. If you don't have it installed and run the download, both Visual Studio Professional 2015 and Update 2 are installed. In either instance, Visual Studio 2015 Language Packs (original release versions) can also be installed.

Files.Description: Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 Update 2 (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (Russian)
Files.Notes:
NOTE: A newer version of Release Management is available with Team Foundation Server (TFS) 2015 Update 2. Release Management features have been integrated into TFS 2015 Update 2 and into the RELEASE hub in TFS web access. The new web-based version is the recommended alternative to the server and client version. For more information, see Release Management for TFS 2015 (Update 2 and above) and VS Team Services.

If you do not already have Release Management installed, we encourage you to use the web-based version in TFS 2015 Update 2 instead of the version described here. If you are already using an earlier server and client version, you may upgrade to the version described here. But, you should be aware that no new features will be added to server and client versions.

This update is the latest in a cumulative series of feature additions and bug fixes for Release Management for Visual Studio 2015.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 supports you to configure, approve, and deploy your applications for any environment. Create automated deployment orchestrations for each environment, no matter how complex the configuration. Delivering software more frequently and easily to an environment enables testers to get to work validating your system and keeps stakeholders engaged in providing feedback.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 requires one of the following licenses: Visual Studio Enterprise with MSDN, Visual Studio Enterprise – annual, Visual Studio Enterprise – monthly, Visual Studio Test Professional with MSDN, or MSDN Platforms. For licensing requirements, see the Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

Files.Description: Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable (x86) - (French)
Files.Notes:
This update is the latest in a cumulative series of feature additions and bug fixes for Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable.

Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable installs run-time components of Visual C++ libraries. These components are required to run C++ applications that are developed using Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 and link dynamically to Visual C++ libraries. The packages can be used to run such applications on a computer even if it does not have Visual Studio 2015 installed. These packages also install run-time components of C Runtime (CRT), Standard C++, MFC, C++ AMP, and OpenMP libraries. Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable includes bug fixes to the runtime DLLs and also the latest versions for KB 2999226.

Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 with Update 2 is an integrated, end-to-end solution for teams of any size with demanding quality and scale needs. Take advantage of comprehensive tools and services for designing, building, and managing complex, enterprise applications and solutions.

These cumulative updates to Visual Studio 2015 include a variety of bug fixes and capability improvements.

If you have Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 installed on a machine with Internet access, Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 displays in the Notifications Hub. To install, select the notification, and then complete the installation actions. You can also download Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 here.

If you don't have it installed and run the download, both Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 and Update 2 are installed. Files.Description: Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable (x64) - (Korean)
Files.Notes:
This update is the latest in a cumulative series of feature additions and bug fixes for Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable.

Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable installs run-time components of Visual C++ libraries. These components are required to run C++ applications that are developed using Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 and link dynamically to Visual C++ libraries. The packages can be used to run such applications on a computer even if it does not have Visual Studio 2015 installed. These packages also install run-time components of C Runtime (CRT), Standard C++, MFC, C++ AMP, and OpenMP libraries. Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable includes bug fixes to the runtime DLLs and also the latest versions for KB 2999226.

Visual Studio 2015 updates provide continuous value to customers, adding new capabilities year-round to features in the main product release. These releases are aligned with core software development trends, ensuring developers and development teams always have access to the best solution for building modern applications.

Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 includes a variety of capability improvements and bug fixes.

Update 2 is the latest in a cumulative series of feature additions and bug fixes for Visual Studio 2015.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 with Update 2 (x86 and x64) - DVD (Chinese-Simplified)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 with Update 2 is an integrated, end-to-end solution for teams of any size with demanding quality and scale needs. Take advantage of comprehensive tools and services for designing, building, and managing complex, enterprise applications and solutions.

These cumulative updates to Visual Studio 2015 include a variety of bug fixes and capability improvements.

If you have Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 installed on a machine with Internet access, Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 displays in the Notifications Hub. To install, select the notification, and then complete the installation actions. You can also download Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 here.

Note: If you have Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 (original release version) installed and run the download from this page, only Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 is installed. If you don't have it installed and run the download, both Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 and Update 2 are installed. In either instance, Visual Studio 2015 Language Packs (original release versions) can also be installed.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Professional 2015 with Update 2 (x86 and x64) - DVD (Korean)
Files.Notes:

Create applications for multiple devices, PCs, and the web — all powered by the cloud and built on top of your existing applications and skills. Use cross-platform technologies to create applications for Windows, Android, and iOS from a single development solution and more.

These cumulative updates to Visual Studio 2015 include a variety of bug fixes and capability improvements.

Files.Description: Microsoft Deployment Agent 2015 Update 2 (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (Spanish)
Files.Notes:
NOTE: A newer version of Release Management is available with Team Foundation Server (TFS) 2015 Update 2. Release Management features have been integrated into TFS 2015 Update 2 and into the RELEASE hub in TFS web access. The new web-based version is the recommended alternative to the server and client version. For more information, see Release Management for TFS 2015 (Update 2 and above) and VS Team Services.

If you do not already have Release Management installed, we encourage you to use the web-based version in TFS 2015 Update 2 instead of the version described here. If you are already using an earlier server and client version, you may upgrade to the version described here. But, you should be aware that no new features will be added to server and client versions.

This update is the latest in a cumulative series of feature additions and bug fixes for Release Management for Visual Studio 2015.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 supports you to configure, approve, and deploy your applications for any environment. Create automated deployment orchestrations for each environment, no matter how complex the configuration. Delivering software more frequently and easily to an environment enables testers to get to work validating your system and keeps stakeholders engaged in providing feedback.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 Update 2 requires one of the following licenses: Visual Studio Enterprise with MSDN, Visual Studio Enterprise – annual, Visual Studio Enterprise – monthly, Visual Studio Test Professional with MSDN, or MSDN Platforms. For licensing requirements, see the Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

VS Release Notes
TFS Release Notes

Files.Description: Microsoft Azure Stack Technical Preview 1 (x64) - (English)
Files.Notes:
Microsoft Azure Stack is a cloud-optimized hybrid application platform which employs a collection of Microsoft Azure technologies that let you offer a rich, self-service, multi-tenant cloud, consistent with the Microsoft Azure experience. It gives you the power of Azure and the control of a datacenter. Microsoft Azure Stack POC (Proof of concept) is an environment for learning about Azure Stack that lets you deploy all required components on a single physical machine.

For more information, see the Azure Stack POC technical documentation.
